snippet.title: 7 Weters away | Point and click game 🎮 WISHLIST ON STEAM
snippet.description:
Add "7 Meters Away. Oscar and the Cell of the Soul" to Your Wishlist Today and Get Ready for the Launch on August 12th!
👉Steam Link👉https://store.steampowered.com/app/3018480/7_Meters_away_Oscar_and_the_Cell_of_the_Soul/

Visual Style:
Pixel Art.
A blend of retro finishes from classic titles with modern lighting techniques.

Game Mechanics:
Point & click.
Use your environment and transform objects into tools to progress in the story.

Verb Coin:
Four action verbs in the classic verb coin that add dynamism to the game.

Playtime:
The estimated playtime to complete the game is 2 hours for the average player.

Dive into one of the best indie adventure games of the year. "7 Meters Away. Oscar and the Cell of the Soul" is an indie point-and-click adventure game with pixel art graphics that will immerse you in a mysterious plot.

In this new mystery game of 2024, you will follow Oscar, a delivery man, on his quest to uncover the secrets of the "Cell of the Soul." With an intriguing storyline and classic puzzles reminiscent of adventure games like Monkey Island or Broken Sword, it's perfect for fans of dystopian games.

Don't miss the gameplay of "7 Meters Away. Oscar and the Cell of the Soul" and add this title to your wishlist. Among the new indie games of 2024, this is a must-play for any fan of the genre.

👉https://store.steampowered.com/app/3018480/A_7_metros_de_m_scar_y_la_celda_del_alma/👈
